pullrequest.title: Model becoming transparent while being manipulated.

content.raw:
I think the behavior here is slightly different from gazebo. In gazebo, the model only becomes semi-transparent when being dragged.

I also noticed a problem with light visuals after leaving the manipulation modes. The light visual becomes completely opaque (all solid faces) when they should just be lines.
content.html:
I think the behavior here is slightly different from gazebo. In gazebo, the model only becomes semi-transparent when being dragged.

I also noticed a problem with light visuals after leaving the manipulation modes. The light visual becomes completely opaque (all solid faces) when they should just be lines.
